name: Kids
text: إِذَا|When|57|106|1370$رُجَّتِ|will be shaken|112|209|16511$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth|92|189|589$رَجًّا|(with) a shaking,|132|181|16512$

name: Kids
text: وَبُسَّتِ|And will be crumbled|155|216|16513$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountains|114|236|9461$بَسًّا|(with awful) crumbling.|172|233|16514$

name: Kids
text: فَأَصْحَـٰبُ|Then (the) companions|174|183|16517$ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ|(of) the right,|112|130|16518$مَآ|what|53|70|262$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|180|409$ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ|(of) the right?|114|123|16518$

name: Kids
text: بِأَكْوَابٍ|With vessels|103|128|16526$وَأَبَارِيقَ|and jugs|99|150|16527$وَكَأْسٍ|and a cup|86|137|16528$مِّن|from|50|101|53$مَّعِينٍ|a flowing stream,|134|159|14614$

name: Kids
text: لَّا|Not|43|59|30$يُصَدَّعُونَ|they will get headache|171|202|16529$عَنْهَا|therefrom|84|116|380$وَلَا|and not|71|102|25$يُنزِفُونَ|they will get intoxicated|180|196|16530$

name: Kids
text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ|And (the) companions|166|174|12126$ٱلْيَمِينِ|(of) the right,|112|129|9978$مَآ|what|53|70|262$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|179|409$ٱلْيَمِينِ|(of) the right?|114|122|9978$

name: Kids
text: إِنَّآ|Indeed, We|96|159|120$أَنشَأْنَـٰهُنَّ|[We] have produced them|194|320|16550$إِنشَآءً|(into) a creation,|134|197|16551$

name: Kids
text: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ|And (the) companions|166|176|12126$ٱلشِّمَالِ|(of) the left,|104|125|10652$مَآ|what|53|74|262$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|183|409$ٱلشِّمَالِ|(of) the left?|106|116|10652$

name: Kids
text: وَكَانُواْ|And they used (to)|147|155|615$يَقُولُونَ|say,|88|104|753$أَئِذَا|` When|70|86|16565$مِتْنَا|we die|63|79|12352$وَكُنَّا|and become|100|116|6992$تُرَابًا|dust|66|82|12280$وَعِظَـٰمًا|and bones,|97|105|12281$أَءِنَّا|will we|64|286|9336$لَمَبْعُوثُونَ|surely be resurrected?|168|390|10391$

name: Kids
text: ثُمَّ|`Then|61|104|293$إِنَّكُمْ|indeed you,|97|184|514$أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ|O those astray!|147|234|16570$ٱلْمُكَذِّبُونَ|the deniers,|110|153|16571$

name: Kids
text: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ|And will drink|108|178|16574$شُرْبَ|(as) drinking|102|243|16575$ٱلْهِيمِ|(of) the thirsty camels.`|183|254|16576$

name: Kids
text: هَـٰذَا|This|59|100|248$نُزُلُهُمْ|(is) their hospitality|150|231|16577$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|186|1057$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) Judgment.|118|158|11$

name: Kids
text: نَحْنُ|We|62|93|103$خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ|[We] created you,|143|205|5846$فَلَوْلَا|so why (do) not|127|189|635$تُصَدِّقُونَ|you admit the truth?|157|188|16578$

name: Kids
text: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|116|640$عَلِمْتُمُ|you know|83|100|641$ٱلنَّشْأَةَ|the creation|101|118|13603$ٱلْأُولَىٰ|the first,|81|98|11384$فَلَوْلَا|so why not|94|111|635$تَذَكَّرُونَ|you take heed?|122|131|6186$

name: Kids
text: ءَأَنتُمْ|Is it you (who)|119|138|1260$تَزْرَعُونَهُۥٓ|cause it to grow|129|167|16585$أَمْ|or|38|76|62$نَحْنُ|(are) We|79|117|103$ٱلزَّٲرِعُونَ|the Ones Who grow?|158|177|16586$

name: Kids
text: لَوْ|If|41|60|905$نَشَآءُ|We willed|82|120|5786$لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ|We (would) surely, make it|198|236|5441$حُطَـٰمًا|debris,|83|121|14961$فَظَلْتُمْ|then you would remain|170|189|16587$تَفَكَّهُونَ|wondering,|93|93|16588$

name: Kids
text: إِنَّا|`Indeed, we|102|290|120$لَمُغْرَمُونَ|surely are laden with debt,|198|386|16589$

name: Kids
text: ءَأَنتُمْ|Is it you|75|99|1260$أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ|who send it down|137|185|16591$مِنَ|from|50|98|156$ٱلْمُزْنِ|the rain clouds,|123|171|16592$أَمْ|or|38|86|62$نَحْنُ|We|62|86|103$ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ|(are) the Ones to send?|180|180|16593$

name: Kids
text: لَوْ|If|41|53|905$نَشَآءُ|We willed,|87|112|5786$جَعَلْنَـٰهُ|We (could) make it|146|171|5440$أُجَاجًا|salty,|75|100|16594$فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ|then why are you not grateful?|227|239|16595$

name: Kids
text: ءَأَنتُمْ|Is it you|75|88|1260$أَنشَأْتُمْ|who produced|113|140|16597$شَجَرَتَهَآ|its tree|95|122|16598$أَمْ|or|38|65|62$نَحْنُ|We|62|89|103$ٱلْمُنشِــُٔونَ|(are) the Producers?|157|170|16599$

name: Kids
text: نَحْنُ|We|62|70|103$جَعَلْنَـٰهَا|have made it|106|123|12087$تَذْكِرَةً|a reminder|89|106|11337$وَمَتَـٰعًا|and a provision|120|137|10083$لِّلْمُقْوِينَ|for the wayfarers in the desert.|230|238|16600$

name: Kids
text: فَسَبِّحْ|So glorify|82|125|9864$بِٱسْمِ|(the) name|94|180|16601$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|203|1322$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Most Great.|125|168|996$

name: Kids
text: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا|Then is it to this|130|170|16609$ٱلْحَدِيثِ|statement|93|174|10614$أَنتُم|that you|77|158|796$مُّدْهِنُونَ|(are) indifferent?|132|172|16610$

name: Kids
text: فَرَوْحٌ|Then rest|84|130|16618$وَرَيْحَانٌ|and bounty|99|190|16619$وَجَنَّتُ|and a Garden|108|199|16620$نَعِيمٍ|(of) Pleasure.|110|156|16621$

name: Kids
text: فَسَبِّحْ|So glorify|82|125|9864$بِٱسْمِ|(the) name|94|180|16601$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|203|1322$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Most Great.|125|168|996$
